title: Valley Point Shopping Centre at 51 Cuppage Road
blurb: Valley Point Shopping Centre at 51 Cuppage Road.
description: Valley Point Shopping Centre offers a variety of retail and amenity options. It provides a convenient shopping experience with a range of stores and services. The centre aims to cater to the needs of the local community and visitors with its diverse offerings. It is a family-friendly destination with amenities suitable for all ages. The shopping centre includes dining options, retail outlets, and service providers. It is designed to be accessible and welcoming to all visitors. The centre also hosts various events and promotions throughout the year.

title: Valley Point Retail and Amenities Information
blurb: Information on retail and amenities at Valley Point.
description: Valley Point offers a variety of retail and amenity options for visitors. This includes shopping, dining, and other services. It is a family-friendly location with amenities suitable for parents and children. The retail options cater to a wide range of needs, and the dining options provide various cuisines. The amenities ensure a comfortable and convenient experience for all visitors. The location is easily accessible and provides a pleasant environment for families to spend time together. The retail mix includes fashion, lifestyle, and specialty stores, providing a diverse shopping experience.

title: Valley Point Nursery Room for Parents and Infants
blurb: Comfortable nursing room with essential amenities.
description: The Valley Point Nursery Room offers a comfortable and private space for parents with infants. It is equipped with a hot and cold water dispenser for preparing formula, a diaper changing station to ensure cleanliness, a cozy chair for comfortable feeding, and power outlets for charging breast pumps. This facility aims to provide a convenient and supportive environment for parents while they are at Valley Point, ensuring their little ones are well taken care of during their visit. The room is designed to be family-friendly and cater to the needs of both parents and babies.

title: Self-Service / Automated Services at Valley Point
blurb: Convenient automated service stations at your fingertips.
description: Discover the convenience of various automated service stations at Valley Point, including ATMs (DBS & OCBC) located on Level 1, a Cashcard Top-up Machine also on Level 1, and a Pop-Station on Level 2. These services provide easy access to banking and parcel services while you shop and dine. Enjoy the added convenience during your visit to Valley Point with these readily available automated solutions.

title: Pet Parking at Valley Point Shopping Centre
blurb: Leave your fur kids at our designated pet parking.
description: While shopping and dining at Valley Point, you can conveniently leave your fur kids at the designated pet parking facility. Please be aware that the management is not responsible for any injuries, accidents, damages, or losses incurred while using this facility. Ensure your pet's safety and well-being while you enjoy your time at Valley Point. This service offers a convenient solution for pet owners visiting the mall.

title: Valley Point Pet Parking Facility for Fur Kids
blurb: Designated pet parking facility for your fur kids.
description: Leave your fur kids at the designated pet parking facility while shopping and dining at Valley Point. Please note that the management cannot be held responsible for any injuries, accidents, damages, or losses incurred when utilizing this pet parking facility. This service provides a convenient option for pet owners visiting the mall, ensuring their pets are safely accommodated during their visit. It's a great amenity for families who want to bring their pets along while they shop or dine.

title: Valley Point Outdoor Playground for Children
blurb: Fun and enjoyable outdoor playground for children.
description: Our outdoor playground provides a fun and enjoyable environment for children, where play is considered to be one of the most effective forms of exercise. This playground offers a safe and engaging space for kids to burn energy and develop their physical skills. It's an ideal spot for families to relax and enjoy some outdoor time while visiting Valley Point. The playground is designed to encourage active play and social interaction among children of various ages.

title: Valley Point Shopping Centre Playground
blurb: Fun and enjoyable environment for children's exercise.
description: Our outdoor playground provides a fun and enjoyable environment for children, where play is considered to be one of the most effective forms of exercise. The playground offers a space for kids to engage in physical activity and have fun in a safe and stimulating setting. It is designed to promote healthy development and social interaction among children of various ages. Parents can relax knowing their children are in a secure environment.

title: Valley Point Shopping Centre Taxi Stand Access
blurb: Sheltered taxi stand near the main entrance.
description: Valley Point Shopping Centre offers a fully sheltered taxi stand strategically positioned near its main entrance, providing visitors with a hassle-free experience, regardless of weather conditions. This amenity ensures convenient access for families and individuals visiting the shopping centre. The taxi stand promotes ease of transportation for all patrons, enhancing their overall shopping experience with added comfort and accessibility.

title: Valley Point Shopping Centre Bicycle Parking Lots
blurb: 16 bicycle parking lots available in the building.
description: Valley Point Shopping Centre promotes a healthy and sustainable lifestyle by providing 16 bicycle parking lots within the building. These facilities encourage visitors to cycle to the shopping centre, supporting eco-friendly transportation options. Families and individuals can conveniently park their bicycles while enjoying the retail and dining offerings at Valley Point, contributing to a greener environment and promoting physical well-being.

title: Valley Point Bicycle Stand for Healthy Lifestyle
blurb: 16 bicycle parking lots available in the building.
description: Valley Point promotes a healthy and sustainable lifestyle by providing 16 bicycle parking lots within the building. It's a simple yet effective way to support eco-friendly transportation and a healthier community.
